page.title: 09WOODLAND LIFE
page.content: Woodhall Spa is famous for the many lovely walks which can be taken in it's pine woods.The old airfield,which was used in World War Two,can still be seen and a walk in the woods can give great opportunities to view the wildlife. There are birds such as chiff-chaffs, waxwings,woodpigeons and many other varieties.There are some rare animals like the brown squirrel.More commonly the red and particularly the grey squirrel can be seen,the latter being especilly tame and numerous. Many woodland plants and animals can be seen by the patient visitor in the woods and hedgerows around Woodhall Spa.
